SELECT t.roomid, cu.custno AS custNo, cu.name AS cname, t.areaname AS haName, t.bulidname AS bname, t.roomname AS name, m.meterNumber AS meterNumber, m.meter_channel AS meterChannel, m.meter_sequence AS meterSequence, m.vendor_id AS vendorId, ce.centorNo AS centorNo, co.nconf AS nconf, mt.name AS hmtname,m.isbranch AS isBranch, m.g_number AS gnumber, to_char(m.starttime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS startTime, p.name AS pname, trim(to_char(m.rate, '9999999999999999')) AS rate, cu.sex AS sex, cu.mobil AS mobil,cu.balance AS balance FROM ((((((SELECT r.roomid,r.custid,r.name AS roomname,a.name AS areaname,b.name AS bulidname FROM ha_room r,ha_area a, ha_building b WHERE r.buildingid=b.buildingid AND b.areaid=a.areaid AND a.areaid IN (#{areaId}) ORDER BY a.name,b.name,r.name) t LEFT JOIN ha_meter m ON m.roomid=t.roomid) LEFT JOIN ha_custom cu ON cu.custid=t.custid) LEFT JOIN ha_pricestandard p ON m.pricestand_id=p.pricestand_id) LEFT JOIN ha_meterType mt ON p.meterTypeId=mt.meterTypeId) LEFT JOIN ha_centor ce ON m.centorid=ce.id) LEFT JOIN ha_collector co ON co.collectorid=m.collectorid
